data.briefIntro: Fashioned with excellent mobility, she can also deal massive amounts of damage after accumulating buffs.
data.textSkill1: Deals damage to enemies and cleanses a buff.
data.textSkill2: Gain 3 stacks of Tuning, granting 6 tiles of Extra Movement after attacking. Also gain 1 Extra Command. Deal stability damage equal to the number of Tuning stacks before attacking.
data.textSkill3: Deals massive damage to enemies. Each stack of Tuning reduces cooldown by 1 turn. Consumes all Tuning, then gains 1 stack of Permanent Tuning.
data.textSkill4: At the beginning of the turn, gains 1 point of Confectance Index and 1 stack of Tuning. When Daiyan has more than 2 stacks of Tuning and an enemy performs a targeted attack within her range, Intercepts the enemy before it attacks and gains 1 stack of Permanent Tuning. Can trigger once per turn.

data.briefIntro: A deadly long-range firepower capable of executing multiple operations through Confectance.
data.textSkill1: Deal Hydro damage to enemies. If this attack exploits phase weakness, gain 2 points of Confectance.
data.textSkill2: Deal damage to enemies and restore Confectance Index. Damage is increased while under the effect of 2 or more buffs.
data.textSkill3: Deal massive Hydro damage to enemies. Damage is increased while under the effect of 3 or more buffs.
data.textSkill4: At the start of the battle, increase the Confectance Index to maximum. If the Confectance Index is at maximum after action, increases damage dealt, and gain an additional action. At the start of the turn, for every 2 points of Confectance Index held, gain a random buff.

data.briefIntro: Covers teammates to reduce stability damage, dealing AoE damage to enemies within range and applying Movement Down.
data.textSkill1: Deal Hydro damage to enemies in range, applying Movement Down and restoring stability based on the number of enemies hit.
data.textSkill2: Deals Hydro damage to enemies in the chosen direction, slowing their movement and destroying destructible cover within a 3x3 area around self.
data.textSkill3: Provide Shelter for all allies, which reduces the stability damage they take, and increase self attack. Passive effect extends over the entire map. A counterattack is performed if an enemy within range deals targeted damage to an ally.
data.textSkill4: Provides Shelter for allied units within 7 tiles. Gains Confectance Index based on the number of instances of damage dealt. After attacking with a skill, generates Tideway tiles within the skill's effective range, applying Hydro weakness to units that remain on those tiles.

data.briefIntro: Cleanses debuffs from allies and provides healing, whilst also cleansing Fear and Stun effects.
data.textSkill1: Deals Burn damage to an enemy and heal the nearest ally after attacking. Gains Heat Recovery, which heals before receiving an attack and cleanses the attacker's buffs.
data.textSkill2: Heal allies within the area and damage enemies. Dispel enemy buffs if they have Overburn applied.
data.textSkill3: Heals all allies and cleanse debuffs, cleanses Fear and Stun, and restores stability to the least stable ally. Applies Heat Recovery after healing.
data.textSkill4: Gains Heat Recovery at the start of battle. While Heat Recovery is active, applies Overburn after an active attack. When an enemy within range takes targeted damage from an allied unit, performs 1 Support Action, gains Confectance Index and applies Heat Recovery to that allied unit.

data.briefIntro: Exceedingly capable in single-target damage, with the capability to support comrades in response to their attacks.
data.textSkill1: Deal Burn damage to an enemy. Damage against exposed enemies is increased.
data.textSkill2: Deal Burn Damage to the first enemy in the chosen direction and apply Overburn.
data.textSkill3: Once activated, increase the damage of the Doll's following support action. Gain 1 extra support action this turn if the Confectance Index is full.
data.textSkill4: When dealing damage, gains 1 point of Confectance Index. When an enemy within range takes targeted damage from an allied unit, performs 1 Support Action.

data.briefIntro: A flexible Support Doll, capable of delivering various forms of Electric damage and laying voltage tiles.
data.textSkill1: Deal Electric damage to the target. If the Confectance Index is at or above 3, consume 3 points to increase damage by 30%.
data.textSkill2: Land at target location up to 3 tiles away, then deal targeted damage to the nearest enemy. If the Confectance Index is at or above 3, consume 3 points and gain 1 Extra Command.
data.textSkill3: Deal Electric damage to all enemies within 5 tiles and create Voltage tiles. Apply Conductivity, causing nearby enemies to gain Conductivity before being attacked. If the Confectance Index is at or above 3, consume 3 points to gain Stealth.
data.textSkill4: When the enemy gains Conductivity, gains 1 Confectance. Targeted damage generates Voltage tiles around the enemy. Gains immunity to all negative effects of Electric tiles.

data.briefIntro: A Doll capable of inflicting Paralysis on the enemy with their single target damage ability, and also possesses the ability to support their teammates with assisted attacks.
data.textSkill1: Deal physical damage to an enemy in range and applies Conductivity.
data.textSkill2: Gain 1 Extra Command, change the next attack's attribute to Electric, and increase its damage.
data.textSkill3: Deal massive damage to an enemy within range. If this attack exploits phase weakness, it also applies Paralyze, preventing them from attacking or using active skills.
data.textSkill4: If an ally attacks an enemy within Mosin's attack range outside of her turn, and the enemy is in Stability Break, performs a Support Attack and gains 2 points of Confectance Index.

data.briefIntro: A Doll with a powerful Electric damage dealt ability, capable of consuming Confectance Index to return fire.
data.textSkill1: Deal Electric damage to an enemy in range. If the target is afflicted with Conductivity, deal more damage and gain 2 points of Confectance. If the target is killed, deal fixed damage to nearby enemies and create Voltage tiles.
data.textSkill2: Cleanses buffs from an enemy within range and deals Physical damage. This damage increases by 10% for each buff cleansed, granting 2 points of Confectance Index. Deals maximum damage if the target is afflicted with Conductivity.
data.textSkill3: Deal AoE Electric damage to enemies in the chosen direction, inflicting extra damage and debuffs on units on nearby Riptide tiles, and subsequently gain the ability to apply Conductivity before performing targeted attacks.
data.textSkill4: At the start of the battle and at the end of the turn, if at max Confectance, gains Preemptive Strike: When an enemy within range initiates an attack, consumes 3 Confectance and Return Fire with a 50% chance to inflict Conductivity before attacking.

data.briefIntro: A potent Doll capable of dealing AoE damage that can deliver catastrophic harm at high levels of Confectance.
data.textSkill1: Deals AoE Corrosion damage to the target and nearby enemies. Cleanses a buff.
data.textSkill2: Deal AoE damage to the target tile and surrounding enemies, pulling them toward the target tile. This skill's cooldown is reduced by 1 turn for each enemy hit.
data.textSkill3: Deal AoE Corrosion damage in a ring around self. Damage increases with the number of enemies hit.
data.textSkill4: When an enemy takes AoE damage outside of Peritya's turn, attacks them and gains 1 point of Confectance Index.

data.briefIntro: A formidable Sentinel Doll who deals Freeze damage, capable of launching Interceptions against enemies attacking her allies.
data.textSkill1: Consume Confectance Index points to deal high Freeze damage to a target. This skill's critical damage is increased, increases attack based on the instances of consectutive attacks.
data.textSkill2: Deal physical damage to the target and gain Confectance. Reduce AoE damage taken.
data.textSkill3: Creates Frost Barrier to protect self. While the Frost Barrier is active, launches an Interception at any enemy within range that attacks an ally and applies Frozen up to 2 times per turn.
data.textSkill4: This unit's critical damage is decreased slightly, but their critical rate increases massively. Damage to Frozen and or Chilled enemies is also increased. When this unit's HP is above 80% at the start of the turn, they gain Insight, increased mobility and immunity to enemy displacement effects.

data.briefIntro: A potent Vanguard Doll with both excellent melee damage capabilities and mobility.
data.textSkill1: Inflicts melee Physical damage to the specific enemy within a 3×3 range, and then gains an instance of additional movement of 6 tiles. If the target does not die from this damage, they will take additional damage if they end their action within a 5 tile range of this unit.
data.textSkill2: Consume Confectance Index points to inflict melee Physical damage to the specified enemy within a 3x3 range, then gain 6 tiles of additional movement. This skill can be used repeatedly.
data.textSkill3: Descend upon a targeted tile within a cross-shaped area and inflict Physical damage on the enemy with the highest current HP within a 1-tile radius whilst consuming all stacks of Hunter's Talent. The more stacks of Hunter's Talent consumed, the higher the damage dealt. If at least 2 stacks of Hunter's Talent are consumed, this unit gains Camouflage and will not be targeted by enemies when other allied units are present.
data.textSkill4: After attacking, gain 1 stack of Hunter's Talent and gain 1 point of Confectance Index. If this unit's HP fall below 30% at the end of an enemy's action, gain a stack of Camouflage.

data.briefIntro: An exceptional Vanguard Doll that possesses superior AoE damage capabilities, Cover destruction, and enemy displacement abilities.
data.textSkill1: Inflict Physical damage to the first unit on each straight line within the chosen area, pushing them back by 4 tiles, whilst destroying destructible Cover outside the perimeter of the given area.
data.textSkill2: Inflict Physical damage on a selected target. If said target is not under the protection of Cover, cleanse 2 of their buffs before launching an attack.
data.textSkill3: Consumes Confectance Index points to inflict AoE Physical damage on all enemies on the target tile and the adjacent two tiles, while increasing the damage they take from this unit, alongside applying vulnerability debuff.
data.textSkill4: Gain 1 Confectance Index point at the start of an action. For every time damage is inflicted, restore 1 Confectance Index point. If this unit moved 5 or more tiles, apply Movement Down to the target before attacking them. Targets with movement debuff will take more damage from this unit.

data.briefIntro: A powerful Support Doll with multiple ways to protect teammates and the ability to quickly reduce the enemy's Stability.
data.textSkill1: Deals Freeze damage to the selected enemy unit. The more allied units nearby, the greater the stability damage inflicted. This skill cannot critically hit, but adds fixed damage based on a certain percentage of the user's defense.
data.textSkill2: Applies a Frost Barrier to a designated allied unit (other than the user) and restores a portion of their stability index. Additionally, increases their defense based on the number of enemies around them.
data.textSkill3: Inflict a fixed amount of damage to enemies within the AoE of the target Tile by consuming Confectance Indexes, leaving behind a Frost Tile, while also applying the Avalanche Debuff. Once stacked to 5 times, stability damage is dealt. Provide a Frost Barrier and Ice Fortress to all allies, restoring stability, cleansing debuffs, and removing the Taunt effect.
data.textSkill4: When an enemy is within attack range and gets attacked, provide supporting fire. At the end of the action, HP is restored for ally units within the vicinity and their Confectance Index replenishes. When an ally unit attacks an enemy, a random enemy will be afflicted with the Avalanche Debuff.

data.briefIntro: A powerful Support Doll that possesses the ability to lay Freeze tiles, boosting damage for her allies.
data.textSkill1: Deals Physical damage to the selected enemy unit. When an enemy unit with a Freeze debuff on the field is killed, gains one stack of Ice's Grace. When this buff reaches max stacks, the Physical damage is converted to Freeze damage and partially ignores Cover's damage reduction. If the target is located on an allied Freeze tile, the damage of this skill is increased.
data.textSkill2: Consumes Confectance to inflict Freeze damage on enemy units within the AoE and generates Freeze tiles. The next time this ability is used, damage is increased, and the enemy targets are inflicted with a Frigid Debuff. When the Confectance Index is full, this ability can be recast.
data.textSkill3: Grants allied units and self the Arctic Benediction buff within range, and applies a Frozen Debuff to the target before initiating an attack. Gains Confectance Index and Glacial Domain, and performs 1 Support Action when enemy units take damage from a targeted attack.
data.textSkill4: Increases damage dealt by all allies, with an additional boost to Freeze damage. At the end of the action, gain Confectance Index points. When at high health, gain a defense boost, Insight, and increase the range of all active skills.

data.briefIntro: A flexible Vanguard Doll with powerful pinpoint displacement abilities, capable of striking enemies in multiple ways.
data.textSkill1: Deals AoE Physical damage to all enemy targets within 4 tiles in the selected direction. If the target has a Hydro debuff, it applies [Stun], rendering the target unable to act. Gains Confectance Index points, and increases the critical rate of the next active attack.
data.textSkill2: Summons a Breath Pin on the selected empty tile, dealing AoE Hydro damage to all enemy targets within 2 tiles around it, and applies [Breath Pin], allowing the attacker to heal when the holder of this debuff takes damage.
data.textSkill3: Descends to the selected tile within 2 tiles around the Breath Pin, dealing Hydro damage to the nearest enemy target within a 6-tile radius, and applies [Congestion], preventing the target from receiving healing.
data.textSkill4: At the end of the action, the unit lands on the selected tile within 2 tiles around the Breath Pin and gains Confectance Index. When enemy units within range take targeted damage from allies, provide a support action, dealing Hydro damage and applying Damp, reducing healing effectiveness.

data.briefIntro: A powerful Corrosion Sentinel Doll, capable of applying various debuffs to enemy units and delivering devastating blows to large groups of enemies.
data.textSkill1: Inflicts AoE Corrosion damage on the target. Launches an additional attack, dealing AoE Corrosion damage to the target and surrounding enemy units while pulling them in. If any kills are made, the cooldown of the Ultimate skill "Devastating Drift" is reduced, and the Doll gains Confectance Index. If no kills are made, [Corrosive Infusion] is applied to the target. At the end of the turn, units with [Corrosive Infusion] suffer AoE Corrosion damage.
data.textSkill2: Deals AoE Corrosion damage to the target and surrounding enemy units, and applies [Toxic Infiltration]. Units with [Toxic Infiltration] will gain [Corrosive Infusion] at the end of their turn. Upon death, nearby allied units will be infected and suffer AoE Corrosion damage. Damage dealt to targets already afflicted with [Toxic Infiltration] is increased.
data.textSkill3: Selects 1 nearby tile and land onto it, dealing AoE Corrosion damage to all enemy units in the path. If 2 or more targets are killed, the skill can be cast again. After using the skill, this Doll gains an Additional Movement.
data.textSkill4: Immune to control type effects. When dealing damage with active attacks, apply 1 stack of [Corrosive Infusion] to the target and increases her Corrosion damage. When the Doll or any allied unit deals Corrosion damage, the unit gains Confectance Index. The cooldown of the Ultimate skill is reduced based on the amount of Confectance Index accumulated.

data.briefIntro: A powerful support Doll who can switch modes. Additional benefits from mode switching include damage type changing, generating terrain effect tiles, Additional Commands and so on.
data.textSkill1: Deals AoE Corrosion damage to the target and all enemy units around it. When in [Frenzy Mode], gain [Movement Up II] and generate [Toxic] tiles in an area.
data.textSkill2:
Mechty recovers Stability Gauge and cleanses all debuffs on herself while applying [Dream Guardian] to all allies within 8 tiles, increasing the damage of their AOE support attacks. 
When in [Frenzy Mode], Mechty can use an active skill or normal attack after using this skill and damage dealt increases.
data.textSkill3: Ends [Recovery Mode] and enters [Frenzy Mode], increasing her attack and defense. At the end of her action, Mechty gains Confectace Index. Once [Frenzy Mode] expires, applies [Nightmare Shield] to all allies.
data.textSkill4: Mechty enters [Recovery Mode] at the start of battle, reducing HP and stability damage taken. Applies [Nightmare] to all ally units.

data.briefIntro: A support Doll who has many ways of dealing fixed damage. She can also generate [Inferno] tiles, which deal fixed damage to surrounding enemy units and apply [Overburn].
data.textSkill1: A shooting attack that grants Confectance Index to Vector and deals Burn damage. If the target is suffering from any Burn-type debuffs, it deals fixed danage to the target and enemy units around it while also applying [Overburn].
data.textSkill2: An attack that deals Burn damage and applies [Firebrand] to the target. When the target takes Burn damage, it creates [Inferno] tiles. Also grants Confectance Index to Vector.
data.textSkill3:
Deals AoE Burn damage to the target and all enemy units within 7 tiles while also creating [Inferno] tiles within the area of effect. Enemies within the area gain Burn weakness and at the end of the action, they gain [Overburn] and fire damage they receive is increased.
All allied units gain [Accelerant], increasing Burn damage that they deal. When dealing Burn damage, they inflict an additional instance of fixed damage.
Vector gains [Extra Command].
data.textSkill4:
Vector is immune to negative effects from Burn-type tiles.
At the start of battle, the number of all assists which deal Burn damage is increased.
At the start of the allied turn, if Vector's Confectance Index gauge is full, Vector expends all Confectance Index and increases her attack.
Before dealing Burn damage, if the target has [Overburn] on them, Vector applies [Overheat Combustion] to them. Units with that effect take fixed damage at the start of their turn.

data.briefIntro: Belka is a Vanguard Doll with extremely high agility, boasting multiple skills that allow extra movement. She can apply [Anion] and many other debuffs to enemy units. After killing a target, she gains [Concealment], which increases her survivability.
data.textSkill1:
An attack that deals physical damage.
The attack's damage increases depending on the number of [Anion] stacks on the field.
If the target is a Boss-type unit and has stacks of [Anion] on them, the amount of damage dealt is automatically maxed out.
Belka gains Confectance Index if this attack inflicts a critical hit.
After using this skill, she can teleport to any empty tile within the skill's range.
data.textSkill2: Belka makes a shooting attack that deals Electric damage and gains [Energetic Battle], which increases the damage of her attacks and changes their type to Electric. After using this skill, she can use the skill [Leaping Taiga] or [Nutcracker Shell]
data.textSkill3: Belka makes a shooting attack that applies [Conductivity]. She also gains [Continuous Discharge], which makes her deal Electric damage and stability damage to the nearest enemy at the end of her action.
data.textSkill4:
Belka gains Confectance Index at the start of the allied turn.
Before attacking, she applies [Anion] to the target and the enemy unit nearest to it, causing them to take fixed damage under multiple situations. In addition, when such units take targeted Electric damage, other uits with [Anion] will take fixed damage as well.
After killing an enemy, she gains [Concealment, which prevents her from being targeted by enemy units.

data.briefIntro: Andoris is a Bulwark-type Doll with extremely high defensive abilities. She can share part of the damage taken by her teammates and will not die after suffering lethal damage for the first time. She can summon Sentry Guns. Sentry Guns deal damage to enemy units and apply Negative Charge.
data.textSkill1: Summons a Sentry Gun on the selected empty tile. This skill can be used multiple times.
data.textSkill2: Shooting enemies applies Electric Charge and deals Electric-type damage to them. Electric Charge causes targets to take extra Stability Damage when taking precision Electric-type damage and restored the attacker's HP.
data.textSkill3: Recovers Stability Index for Andoris. Also applies Cover and Positive Charge to all allies while Andoris gains Rigid Stance. When in Rigid Stance, Andoris no longer benefits from cover, but she takes reduced HP and stability damage.
data.textSkill4:
At the start of battle, gain Self-Diagnosis. Upon taking fatal damage, Andoris does not die; instead she cleanses all negative statuses on herself and recovers all HP and Stability Index.
When an ally with Positive Charge is damaged, part of that damage is shared with her. When  attacking an enemy with Negative Charge, she recovers HP.
When damaged, she recovers HP and gains Confectance Index as well as applying Nonconductance to herself and all Sentry Guns, which increases the target's DEF. If the target does not benefit from cover, Stability Index is expended and damage taken is decreased.
